entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then snow. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
